description: Djeco Golfy Marbles Game lets you construct your own marble golf course. Comes with 14 plastic pieces which kids can arrange to create an exciting obstacle round game. The game can be set up in moments and is great for indoor and outdoor use - simply place the pieces together and get playing! Includes a handy storage bag for easy tidy-up and carrying. Kids will develop spatial awareness as they work out how to put the pieces together to set up the game. Educational Benefits of Djeco Golfy Marbles Game Spatial Awareness. Hand-To-Eye Coordination. Gross Motor Skills. Screen-Free Play. Contains: 14 plastic pieces. 10 marbles. 1 bag (fabric). Box Size: 30 x 28 x 9cm. For 1 to 6 players. Ages 7 - 12.

Djeco Golfy Marbles Game lets you construct your own marble golf course.

 Comes with 14 plastic pieces which kids can arrange to create an exciting obstacle round game. The game can be set up in moments and is great for indoor and outdoor use - simply place the pieces together and get playing! Includes a handy storage bag for easy tidy-up and carrying. Kids will develop spatial awareness as they work out how to put the pieces together to set up the game.

 Educational Benefits of Djeco Golfy Marbles Game

  
 * Spatial Awareness. 
 * Hand-To-Eye Coordination. 
 * Gross Motor Skills. 
 * Screen-Free Play.  Contains:

  
 * 14 plastic pieces. 
 * 10 marbles. 
 * 1 bag (fabric).  Box Size: 30 x 28 x 9cm.

 For 1 to 6 players.

 Ages 7 - 12.

description: Experience a beautiful cloud in your own room. Enchanting cloud nightlight appears to float on the clear stand. Colour-change light show with rain and thunder sounds. Mode 1: relax to the sound of gentle rain with a calming, colour-change LED lights. Perfect for dropping off to sleep. Mode 2: colour-change lights only, will add atmosphere to any room. Mode 3: bring the force of nature into your room with thrilling thunder sounds and cool lightning effects. Hear the storm, whilst you stay warm and cosy in bed! Great for both adults and children. A wonderful way to relax at bedtime. With auto shut-off.  Secret code unlocks multilingual online cloud information. Uses flashing lights, within safety guidelines. Requires 3 AA batteries Age 3+

description:
Wonders of Space Sensory Activity Kit.

 This space-themed kit has all the loose parts play materials children need to learn through hands-on, sensory play activities.

 This sensory play kit engages children’s senses while helping them build fine motor skills through fun, creative activities.

 Materials store in the wooden bin after playtime and can be used over and over again.

 Age 3+

description:
A manual play game with three sweet little wooden animals that children can use to practice opening and closing locks. Locktou supports children aged 3 and over as they begin to learn.

   Three animal-shaped boards: a fox, a cat, and a bear.
 Three metallic fastenings to open and close: a key, a latch, and a lever closure.
 A surprise picture appears when you open the door!
 Develops children’s logic, coordination and dexterity.
 Teaches children everyday movements.
 FSC® certified wood.

 Age 3+

Develops children’s logic, coordination and dexterity. Teaches children everyday movements. FSC® certified wood. Age 3+

 Children can explore various ways to sort or pattern by colour, shape, number of wheels and more.

 The opportunities to think creatively  about making patterns, sorting and counting are endless.

 Age 3+

Playfoam is a completely mess free creative play resource that is great for sensory play.

 This bumper pack of 20 pods makes a great play set for groups of children or even parties!

 This Learning Resources award winning product helps develop fine motor skills for little hands. The non toxic formula makes this best selling Playfoam great for safe creative play. It doesn't stick to hands, clothes or carpet, just to itself!

 
What's even better is Playfoam never dries out, so children can display their masterpieces rather than having to put it all back in the box!

 
Children simply mould Playfoam into anything in their imagination before squashing it down and starting again, offering endless play opportunities.

 
Set of 20 individual 9cm pods in 8 vibrant colours, including sparkle
Possible colour transfer: Playfoam® may transfer colour stain to fabric and plastic. Stains can be removed from tabletops using olive oil.

 Suitable for ages 3+

 * eraser

description: Get together with your BFFs for some bracelet making fun! This kit lets you weave amazing designs with the easy to use bracelet square and wheel, create cool hand knotted patterns, and even write out your own name in colorful thread. With tons of trendy patterns to make, you'll have a great time showing off your personality and style with fabulous friendship bracelets! This Kit Includes: 1 instruction book 16 skeins of string (139 yd/128 m) 1 square bracelet loom 1 round bracelet loom 20 pom-poms 8 pattern templates Lettering templates Assorted beads 1 tassel 3 charms Age 6+

Get together with your BFFs for some bracelet making fun! This kit lets you weave amazing designs with the easy to use bracelet square and wheel, create cool hand knotted patterns, and even write out your own name in colorful thread. With tons of trendy patterns to make, you'll have a great time showing off your personality and style with fabulous friendship bracelets!

 This Kit Includes:

   
 * 1 instruction book

 * 1 square bracelet loom

 * 20 pom-poms

Playfoam is a completely mess free creative play resource that is great for sensory play.

 This bumper pack of 20 pods makes a great play set for groups of children or even parties!

 This Learning Resources award winning product helps develop fine motor skills for little hands. The non toxic formula makes this best selling Playfoam great for safe creative play. It doesn't stick to hands, clothes or carpet, just to itself!

 
What's even better is Playfoam never dries out, so children can display their masterpieces rather than having to put it all back in the box!

 
Children simply mould Playfoam into anything in their imagination before squashing it down and starting again, offering endless play opportunities.

 
Set of 20 individual 9cm pods in 8 vibrant colours, including sparkle
Possible colour transfer: Playfoam® may transfer colour stain to fabric and plastic. Stains can be removed from tabletops using olive oil.

 Suitable for ages 3+
